document.docAuthor: Ghahari, Hassan, Moulet, Pierre & Rider, David A.
document.masterDocTitle: An annotated catalog of the Iranian Pentatomoidea (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomomorpha)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An annotated catalog of the Iranian Pentatomoidea (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomomorpha)

subSubSection.paragraph: General distribution. Northeastern Mediterranean basin (from Italy ), not in Cyprus , Caucasus, Central Asia extending to China , Near East, Egypt , Pakistan .

Host plants. On barley (
Farahbakhsh 1961
;
Modarres Awal 1997 b
), wheat (
Farahbakhsh 1961
;
Modarres Awal 1996 a
, b ,
1997 a
, b ,
2008
;
Khanjani 2006
;
Hassanzadeh et al . 2009 a
, b ;
Sadeghi et al . 2009
;
Khaghaninia et al . 2010 a
, b ), under
Astragalus
sp. ( Fabaceae ) (
Modarres Awal 1996 a
), blue-grass, brome chess, brome grass, bulbous, intermediate wheatgrass, milk vetch, mitre cress, mountain rye, Persian candle,
Aegilops
sp.,
Agropyron caespitosum
,
A. libanoticum
,
A . pectiniform
,
A. trichophorum, Boissiera squarrosa
,
Bromus lanceolatus
,
B. tectorum
var. hirsutus
,
B. tectorum
var. tectorum
,
B . tomentellus
,
Secale montanum
,
Eremopyrum bonapartis
var. sublanuginosum
,
E . distans
,
Hordeum glaucum
,
H . spontaneum
,
Heteranthelium pitiferum
,
Stipa hohenackeriana
,
Taeniatherum crinitum
( Poaceae ),
Helichrysum oligocephalum
( Asteraceae ),
Hypecoum pendulum
( Papaveraceae ),
Silene arguta
( Caryophyllaceae ) (
Modarres Awal 1997 b
), Poaceae (
Heiss 2002
;
Linnavuori 2008
),
Triticum vulgare
( Poaceae ) (Sakenin et al . 2008 ),
Hordeum vulgare
,
Triticum aestivum
(both Poaceae ) (
Nateq Golestan & Modarres Awal 2012
).

Comment. A great number of varieties have been described for this species which have no taxonomic value, e.g.
nigra
, ferruginea , testacea , grisescens , plagiata by
Reuter, 1900
,
hellenica
, subgrisea , nigricans ,
fieberi
by Kirkaldy, 1909 .
